user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Security Setup
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and user login mechanisms.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that allows customers to securely access the self-service portal. This includes implementing multi-factor authentication, encryption mechanisms for sensitive data, secure session handling, and compliance with banking security standards. The system should also include password recovery and user management features to ensure accessibility and security.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and develop a responsive, personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Create a modern, responsive web interface accessible from desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The dashboard should dynamically display relevant banking products, account summaries, and services based on user profiles. The design should prioritize usability, accessibility, and quick navigation, providing customers with an intuitive self-service experience.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s existing core banking systems.
epics.description: Establish seamless communication between the self-service portal and core banking systems to synchronize customer data, account information, and transaction details. Implement secure APIs and data connectors that ensure real-time data consistency, performance optimization, and adherence to data privacy regulations during integrations.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement online workflows for account opening and service modification requests.
epics.description: Build streamlined workflows that allow customers to submit new account applications and service modification requests through the portal. These workflows should minimize manual input, allow saving and resuming of incomplete applications, include document upload capabilities, and trigger automated validations to ensure data completeness and eligibility compliance.

epics.title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Tracking
epics.summary: Enable real-time status updates and automated notifications for customer requests.
epics.description: Develop a notification system that provides users with instant updates regarding the progress of their submitted applications and service requests. Implement email and in-app notification mechanisms that alert customers when actions are required or when requests are completed, ensuring transparency and engagement throughout the process.

epics.title: Interaction History and Data Management
epics.summary: Maintain comprehensive interaction logs and manage user data securely.
epics.description: Implement functionality to record every user interaction within the portal, including application submissions, updates, and modifications. Ensure historical data is easily accessible to users while maintaining compliance with data protection and retention policies. The data storage mechanism should ensure reliability, scalability, and strict adherence to financial data security standards.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
epics.summary: Establish a role-based access control system to manage user permissions.
epics.description: Create a fine-grained role-based access control mechanism to ensure that users can only view and interact with services and data appropriate to their roles and authorization levels. This includes setting up access policies for different customer types, administrative roles, and bank staff involved in backend processing of customer requests.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Scalability
epics.summary: Enhance system speed, performance, and capacity to handle high concurrent usage.
epics.description: Optimize the self-service portal's performance to ensure minimal latency, fast data retrieval, and reliability under high traffic loads. Implement caching strategies, load balancing, and efficient database queries to enhance responsiveness and support scalability for future growth.
